attributes.action: Ensure that 'adult' prices are paid only by those officially recognised as adults by the United Kingdom's law, i.e. Anyone 18 years old and above.
attributes.additional_details: 'Adult' prices- as charged by varies companies, corporations and businesses- should apply only to those recognised by UK law, i.e. Persons aged 18 years old and above. Anyone under 18 years of age should be recognised as 'children' and therefore pay the price of a 'child'. This applies, as a few examples, to cinemas, train operators
